subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Leinster trailed Northampton 22-6 at halftime in the Heineken Cup, but Jonathan Sexton brought the team to life with a fiery locker-room speech and sterling play in the second half.
snippet: Leinster trailed Northampton 22-6 at halftime in the Heineken Cup, but Jonathan Sexton brought the team to life with a fiery locker-room speech and sterling play in the second half.
